name: linear
title: Linear
description: Manage your projects autonomously. Have your bot participate in discussions, manage issues and teams, and track progress.

id.title: User ID
id.description: The ID of the user on Linear

issueCreated.title: Issue Created
issueCreated.description: Triggered when an issue is created

title.description: The issue title on Linear, such as "Fix the bug

number.description: The issue number on Linear, such as "123" in XXX-123

createdAt.description: The ISO date the issue was created

updatedAt.description: The ISO date the issue was last updated

priority.description: Priority of the issue, such as "1" for "Urgent", 0 for "No Priority"

description.description: A markdown description of the issue. Images and videos are inlined using markdown links.

teamName.description: The name of the Linear team the issue currently belongs to, such as "Customer Support"

teamKey.description: The key of the Linear team the issue currently belongs to, such as "XXX" in XXX-123

status.description: The issue State name (such as "In Progress"

creatorId.description: The internal Linear User ID of the user who created the issue

labelIds.description: The internal Linear Label IDs associated with the issue

subscriberIds.description: The internal Linear Subscriber User IDs

linearIds.description: The Linear IDs of the referenced entities

userId.description: The Botpress User ID of the individual who initiated the issue. If not provided, it indicates the issue was generated by the bot.

conversationId.description: Botpress Conversation ID of the issue

issueUpdated.title: Issue Updated
issueUpdated.description: Triggered when an issue is updated

title.description: The issue title on Linear, such as "Fix the bug

number.description: The issue number on Linear, such as "123" in XXX-123

createdAt.description: The ISO date the issue was created

updatedAt.description: The ISO date the issue was last updated

priority.description: Priority of the issue, such as "1" for "Urgent", 0 for "No Priority"

description.description: A markdown description of the issue. Images and videos are inlined using markdown links.

teamName.description: The name of the Linear team the issue currently belongs to, such as "Customer Support"

subscriberIds.description: The internal Linear Subscriber User IDs

linearIds.description: The Linear IDs of the referenced entities

userId.description: The Botpress User ID of the individual who initiated the issue. If not provided, it indicates the issue was generated by the bot.

conversationId.description: Botpress Conversation ID of the issue

tags.description: The tags applied to the issue

channel.description: The channel of the search result

count.description: The number of issues to return

teamId.description: The team ID to filter by

startDate.description: Ignore issues created before this date

title.description: The issue title on Linear, such as "Fix the bug

number.description: The issue number on Linear, such as "123" in XXX-123

createdAt.description: The ISO date the issue was created

updatedAt.description: The ISO date the issue was last updated

priority.description: Priority of the issue, such as "1" for "Urgent", 0 for "No Priority"

description.description: A markdown description of the issue. Images and videos are inlined using markdown links.

estimate.description: The estimate of the issue in points

url.description: The URL of the issue on Linear

creatorId.description: The internal Linear User ID of the user who created the issue

labelIds.description: The internal Linear Label IDs associated with the issue

subscriberIds.description: The internal Linear Subscriber User IDs

linearIds.description: The Linear IDs of the referenced entities

nextCursor.description: The cursor to fetch the next page

id.description: The unique identifier of the entity

count.description: The number of users to return

avatarUrl.description: The URL of the user avatar

description.description: The user's description, such as their title or bio

lastSeen.description: The last time the user was seen

updatedAt.description: The last time the user was updated

nextCursor.description: The cursor to fetch the next page

markAsDuplicate.title: Mark Issue as Duplicate
markAsDuplicate.description: Mark an issue as a duplicate of another

issueId.description: The issue ID on Linear. Ex: {{event.payload.linearIds.issueId}}

relatedIssueId.description: The ID of the existing issue on Linear

getIssue.title: Get Issue
getIssue.description: Get an issue by its ID

issueId.description: The issue ID on Linear. Ex: {{event.payload.linearIds.issueId}}

title.description: The issue title on Linear, such as "Fix the bug

number.description: The issue number on Linear, such as "123" in XXX-123

createdAt.description: The ISO date the issue was created

updatedAt.description: The ISO date the issue was last updated

priority.description: Priority of the issue, such as "1" for "Urgent", 0 for "No Priority"

getUser.title: Get User Profile
getUser.description: Get a user profile from Linear

linearUserId.description: The user's ID on Linear. Ex: {{event.payload.linearIds.creatorId}}

admin.description: Indicates if the user is an admin of the organization

archivedAt.description: Date when the user was archived

avatarUrl.description: The URL for the profile picture

createdAt.description: Date when the user was created

description.description: A short description of the user, either its title or bio

displayName.description: The user's display (nick) name. Unique within each organization

guest.description: Whether the user is a guest in the workspace and limited to accessing a subset of teams

isMe.description: Whether the user is the currently authenticated user

timezone.description: The local timezone of the user

issueId.description: The issue ID on Linear. Example: {{event.payload.id}}

teamName.description: Type a name to change the assigned team of the issue

labels.description: One or multiple labels to assign to this issue

project.description: A project to associate to this issue
